trans-unit.source: Represents a security token provider that handles security tokens for a SOAP message sender.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en sikkerhet token leverandør som behandler sikkerhetstokener for en SOAP-avsender.

trans-unit.source: Use the SecurityTokenProvider class when custom security tokens are required.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SecurityTokenProvider klassen når egendefinert sikkerhetstokener kreves.

trans-unit.source: The role of a security token provider is to get a security token when a SOAP message is sent by a client and a security token is used to authenticate the client or to protect the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: Role for en token security-leverandør er å få en sikkerhetskode når en SOAP-melding sendt av en klient og en sikkerhetskode brukes til å godkjenne klienten eller beskytte SOAP-meldingen.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method is called to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>metoden kalles for å få en sikkerhetskode.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The security token provider can also be called to cancel and renew a security using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelToken%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewToken%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhet token leverandøren kan også kalles for å avbryte og fornye sikkerhet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelToken%2A>og <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewToken%2A>metoder.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager> class implement the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager.CreateSecurityTokenProvider%2A> method to determine which security token provider is required for a given security token.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager>implementere klassen den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager.CreateSecurityTokenProvider%2A>metode for å finne ut hvilke sikkerhet token leverandøren kreves for en gitt sikkerhetskode.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager.CreateSecurityTokenProvider%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager> classes provide the default implementations for built-in security token types.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>Angi standard implementeringer for innebygd sikkerhet token typer.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>

trans-unit.source: For custom security token scenarios, you must derive a class from one of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager> classes and provide the functionality to create the security token provider, security token authenticator, and security token serializer for the custom security token.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinert sikkerheten token scenarioer, må du være utledet en klasse fra én av de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>, eller <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>klasser og gir funksjonalitet for å opprette sikkerhet token leverandøren, Sikkerhetstokengodkjenneren og sikkerhet token serialisering for egendefinert sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] creating a custom token, see [How to: Create a Custom Token](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]opprette en egendefinert token, se [slik: opprette en egendefinert Token](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to cancel a security token.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron operasjon for å avbryte en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
trans-unit.target: En sikkerhetskode som kan avbrytes, for eksempel en som er utstedt, kan en klient som ble forespurt en sikkerhetskode avbryte når du er ferdig med den.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that cancels the security token.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir verdien for tidsavbrudd for meldingen som avbryter sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to cancel.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> å avbryte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representant får beskjed om den asynkrone lukke operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Intet objekt angitt av appen, som inneholder statusinformasjon som er knyttet til den asynkrone lukke operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous cancel operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som refererer til asynkrone Avbryt-operasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir verdien for tidsavbrudd for meldingen som avbryter sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> å avbryte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representant får beskjed om den asynkrone lukke operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Intet objekt angitt av appen, som inneholder statusinformasjon som er knyttet til den asynkrone lukke operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous cancel operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som refererer til asynkrone Avbryt-operasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron operasjon for å få en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: The BeginGetToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall BeginGetToken den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetTokenCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir verdien for tidsavbrudd for meldingen som henter sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representant får beskjed om den asynkrone lukke operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Intet objekt angitt av appen, som inneholder statusinformasjon som er knyttet til den asynkrone lukke operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som refererer til den asynkrone Lukkeoperasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron operasjon for å få en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> class you are not required to override the asynchronous methods, as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> base class provides asynchronous support based upon the synchronous methods.
trans-unit.target: Når du arve fra den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>klassen du ikke trenger å overstyre metodene asynkrone som den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>basisklassen støtter asynkrone basert på metodene synkron.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to override the BeginGetTokenCore method, unless you must provide your own asynchronous implementation.
trans-unit.target: Derfor trenger du ikke å overstyre metoden BeginGetTokenCore med mindre du må oppgi asynkrone implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetToken%2A> method calls the BeginGetTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetToken%2A>metodekall metoden BeginGetTokenCore.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir verdien for tidsavbrudd for meldingen som henter sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representant får beskjed om den asynkrone lukke operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Intet objekt angitt av appen, som inneholder statusinformasjon som er knyttet til den asynkrone lukke operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som refererer til den asynkrone operasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation that renews a security token.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron operasjon som fornyes en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: The BeginRenewToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall BeginRenewToken den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewTokenCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that renews the security token.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir verdien for tidsavbrudd for meldingen som fornyes sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to renew.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> fornye.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representant får beskjed om den asynkrone lukke operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Intet objekt angitt av appen, som inneholder statusinformasjon som er knyttet til den asynkrone lukke operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som refererer til den asynkrone operasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation that renews a security token.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron operasjon som fornyes en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> class you are not required to override the asynchronous methods, as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> base class provides asynchronous support based upon the synchronous methods.
trans-unit.target: Når du arve fra den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>klassen du ikke trenger å overstyre metodene asynkrone som den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>basisklassen støtter asynkrone basert på metodene synkron.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to override the BeginRenewTokenCore method, unless you must provide your own asynchronous implementation.
trans-unit.target: Derfor trenger du ikke å overstyre metoden BeginRenewTokenCore med mindre du må oppgi asynkrone implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewToken%2A> method calls the BeginRenewTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewToken%2A>metodekall metoden BeginRenewTokenCore.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that renews the security token.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir verdien for tidsavbrudd for meldingen som fornyes sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to renew.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> fornye.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.AsyncCallback>representant får beskjed om den asynkrone lukke operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.target: Intet objekt angitt av appen, som inneholder statusinformasjon som er knyttet til den asynkrone lukke operasjonen.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som refererer til den asynkrone operasjonen.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Cancels a security token.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
trans-unit.target: En sikkerhetskode som kan avbrytes, for eksempel en som er utstedt, kan en klient som ble forespurt en sikkerhetskode avbryte når du er ferdig med den.

trans-unit.source: The CancelToken method calls <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall CancelToken <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelTokenCore%2A>metode.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that cancels the security token.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir verdien for tidsavbrudd for meldingen som avbryter sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to cancel.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> å avbryte.

trans-unit.source: Cancels a security token.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
trans-unit.target: En sikkerhetskode som kan avbrytes, for eksempel en som er utstedt, kan en klient som ble forespurt en sikkerhetskode avbryte når du er ferdig med den.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelToken%2A> method calls CancelTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelToken%2A>metodekall CancelTokenCore-metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.CancelToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the CancelTokenCore method is overridden and the security token passed into the token parameter cannot be canceled, throw the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Når metoden CancelTokenCore overstyres sikkerhetstokenet som ble sendt til parameteren token kan ikke avbrytes og iverksett den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>unntak.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that cancels the security token.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir verdien for tidsavbrudd for meldingen som avbryter sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to cancel.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> å avbryte.

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to cancel a security token.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører en asynkron operasjon for å avbryte en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
trans-unit.target: En sikkerhetskode som kan avbrytes, for eksempel en som er utstedt, kan en klient som ble forespurt en sikkerhetskode avbryte når du er ferdig med den.

trans-unit.source: The EndCancelToken method calls <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndCancelTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall EndCancelToken <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndCancelTokenCore%2A>metode.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndCancelTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginCancelToken*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som returneres av et kall til den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginCancelToken*>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginCancelToken*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to cancel a security token.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører en asynkron operasjon for å avbryte en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
trans-unit.target: En sikkerhetskode som kan avbrytes, for eksempel en som er utstedt, kan en klient som ble forespurt en sikkerhetskode avbryte når du er ferdig med den.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> class you are not required to override the asynchronous methods, as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> base class provides asynchronous support based upon the synchronous methods.
trans-unit.target: Når du arve fra den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>klassen du ikke trenger å overstyre metodene asynkrone som den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>basisklassen støtter asynkrone basert på metodene synkron.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to override the EndCancelTokenCore method, unless you must provide your own asynchronous implementation.
trans-unit.target: Derfor trenger du ikke å overstyre metoden EndCancelTokenCore med mindre du må oppgi asynkrone implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndCancelToken%2A> method calls EndCancelTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndCancelToken%2A>metodekall EndCancelTokenCore-metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndCancelToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginCancelTokenCore*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som returneres av et kall til den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginCancelTokenCore*>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginCancelTokenCore*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører en asynkron operasjon for å få en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: The EndGetToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndGetTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall EndGetToken den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndGetTokenCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndGetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetToken*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som returneres av et kall til den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetToken*>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetToken*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> som representerer sikkerhetstokenet.

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to get a security token.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører en asynkron operasjon for å få en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> class you are not required to override the asynchronous methods, as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> base class provides asynchronous support based upon the synchronous methods.
trans-unit.target: Når du arve fra den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>klassen du ikke trenger å overstyre metodene asynkrone som den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>basisklassen støtter asynkrone basert på metodene synkron.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to override the EndGetTokenCore method, unless you must provide your own asynchronous implementation.
trans-unit.target: Derfor trenger du ikke å overstyre metoden EndGetTokenCore med mindre du må oppgi asynkrone implementeringen.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndGetToken%2A>metodekall metoden EndGetTokenCore.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndGetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetTokenCore*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som returneres av et kall til den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetTokenCore*>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginGetTokenCore*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> som representerer sikkerhetstokenet.

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to renew a security token.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører en asynkron operasjon for å fornye en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: The EndRenewToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndRenewTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall EndRenewToken den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndRenewTokenCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndRenewTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewToken*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som returneres av et kall til den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewToken*>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewToken*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token that is renewed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> som representerer sikkerhetstokenet som fornyes.

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to renew the security token.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører en asynkron operasjon for å fornye sikkerhetstokenet.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> class you are not required to override the asynchronous methods, as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> base class provides asynchronous support based upon the synchronous methods.
trans-unit.target: Når du arve fra den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>klassen du ikke trenger å overstyre metodene asynkrone som den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>basisklassen støtter asynkrone basert på metodene synkron.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you are not required to override the EndRenewTokenCore method, unless you must provide your own asynchronous implementation.
trans-unit.target: Derfor trenger du ikke å overstyre metoden EndRenewTokenCore med mindre du må oppgi asynkrone implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndRenewToken%2A> method calls the EndRenewTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndRenewToken%2A>metodekall metoden EndRenewTokenCore.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.EndRenewToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that is returned by a call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewTokenCore*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som returneres av et kall til den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewTokenCore*>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.BeginRenewTokenCore*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token that is renewed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> som representerer sikkerhetstokenet som fornyes.

trans-unit.source: Gets a security token.
trans-unit.target: Henter en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: The GetToken method is called by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class when a client sends a SOAP message and a security token is required.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetToken kalles av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>klasse når en klient sender en SOAP-melding og det kreves en sikkerhetskode.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>

trans-unit.source: The GetToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall GetToken den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: In most cases the `timeout` parameter is not used by derived classes of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider> such as <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider>.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller i `timeout` parameteren brukes ikke av avledede klasser i <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>for eksempel <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNameSecurityTokenProvider> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: However, sometimes retrieving a security token involves distributed messaging.
trans-unit.target: Noen ganger henting av en sikkerhetskode inkluderer imidlertid distribuerte meldinger.

trans-unit.source: An example is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenProvider> used in a federated service.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel er <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenProvider>brukes i en sammenslått tjeneste.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenProvider>

trans-unit.source: In these cases the `timeout` parameter is used to avoid exceptions caused by network failures, message loss, and other error conditions.
trans-unit.target: I slike tilfeller den `timeout` parameteren brukes til å unngå unntak forårsaket av en nettverksfeil, melding tap og andre feil.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir verdien for tidsavbrudd for meldingen som henter sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token to get.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> som representerer sikkerhetskode for å hente.

trans-unit.source: Gets a security token.
trans-unit.target: Henter en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: When the GetTokenCore method is overridden and the security token passed into the token parameter cannot be obtained, throw the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Når metoden GetTokenCore overstyres og kan ikke hente sikkerhetstokenet som ble sendt til parameteren token, iverksette den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>unntak.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class when a client sends a SOAP message and a security token is required.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>-metoden den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>klasse når en klient sender en SOAP-melding og det kreves en sikkerhetskode.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A> method calls the GetTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>metodekall metoden GetTokenCore.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.GetToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that gets the security token.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir verdien for tidsavbrudd for meldingen som henter sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token to get.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> som representerer sikkerhetskode for å hente.

trans-unit.source: Renews a security token.
trans-unit.target: Fornyer en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: An issued security token that is renewable allows a client to renew it when the security token is about to or has expired.
trans-unit.target: En utstedte sikkerhetstokenet som fornybart lar en klient fornye når sikkerhetstokenet er i ferd med å eller har utløpt.

trans-unit.source: The RenewToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall RenewToken den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewTokenCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that renews the security token.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir verdien for tidsavbrudd for meldingen som fornyes sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to renew.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> fornye.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token that is renewed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> som representerer sikkerhetstokenet som fornyes.

trans-unit.source: Renews a security token.
trans-unit.target: Fornyer en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: An issued security token that is renewable allows a client to renew it when the security token is about to or has expired.
trans-unit.target: En utstedte sikkerhetstokenet som fornybart lar en klient fornye når sikkerhetstokenet er i ferd med å eller har utløpt.

trans-unit.source: When the RenewTokenCore method is overridden and the security token passed into the token parameter cannot be renewed, throw the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Når metoden RenewTokenCore overstyres og sikkerhetstokenet som ble sendt til parameteren token kan ikke fornyes, iverksette den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>unntak.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewToken%2A> method calls the RenewTokenCore method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewToken%2A>metodekall metoden RenewTokenCore.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider.RenewToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the timeout value for the message that renews the security token.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som angir verdien for tidsavbrudd for meldingen som fornyes sikkerhetstokenet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to renew.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> fornye.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token that is renewed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> som representerer sikkerhetstokenet som fornyes.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the security token can be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om sikkerhetstokenet kan avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
trans-unit.target: En sikkerhetskode som kan avbrytes, for eksempel en som er utstedt, kan en klient som ble forespurt en sikkerhetskode avbryte når du er ferdig med den.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the security token can be cancelled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sikkerhetstokenet kan avbrytes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the security token is renewable.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om sikkerhetstokenet fornybart.

trans-unit.source: An issued security token that is renewable allows a client to renew it when the security token is about to or has expired.
trans-unit.target: En utstedte sikkerhetstokenet som fornybart lar en klient fornye når sikkerhetstokenet er i ferd med å eller har utløpt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the security token can be renewed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sikkerhetstokenet kan fornyes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
